Class EntityAssertBase<T extends Bean,A extends EntityAssertBase<T,A>>

    public class EntityAssertBase<T extends Bean,A extends EntityAssertBase<T,A>>
extends CCBaseAssert<T,A>
    Base class for entity specific assertions.

    • Method Detail

      • as

        public A as(java.lang.String description)
        Sets the description of the actual value, to be used in as message of any AssertionError thrown when an assertion fails. This method should be called before any assertion method, otherwise any assertion failure will not show the provided description.

        For example: 

         assertThat(val).as("name").isEqualTo("Frodo");

        If a %s is specified in the description string, it will be replaced by the display name of the entity
        Overrides:
        as in class com.guidewire.testharness.assertion.BaseAssert<T extends Bean,A extends EntityAssertBase<T,A>>
        Parameters:
        description - the description of the actual value.
        Returns:
        this assertion object.

      • isInstanceOf

        public A isInstanceOf(java.lang.Class<?> type)
        Verifies that the actual entity is an instance of the given type.
        Parameters:
        type - the type to check the actual entity against.
        Returns:
        this assertion object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.AssertionError - if the actual entity is not an instance of the given type.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the given type is null.

      • isInstanceOf

        public A isInstanceOf(IEntityType type)
        Verifies that the actual entity is an instance of the given type.
        Parameters:
        type - the type to check the actual entity against.
        Returns:
        this assertion object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.AssertionError - if the actual entity is not an instance of the given type.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the given type is null.

      • usingDisplayName

        public A usingDisplayName(EntityAssertDisplayName<T> displayName)
        Specify how to display the entity; the result of this call will be inserted into the description specified using as(String) wherever the string %s appears.
        Parameters:
        displayName - translates entity into a string, must not be null
        Returns:
        this

        protected IEntityPropertyInfo getNamedProperty(java.lang.String name)
        Get the named property from the typeinfo of the actual object and return it as an EntityPropertyInfo
        Parameters:
        name - the non null name of the desired property
        Returns:
        an entity property, never null
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if there is no entity property with the given name

      • withLinkedEntity

        protected <B,BA extends com.guidewire.testharness.assertion.BaseAssert<B,BA>> A withLinkedEntity(IEntityPropertyInfo propertyInfo,
                                                                                                 java.lang.Class<BA> assertClass,
                                                                                                 AssertEvaluator<B,BA> assertEvaluator)
        Utility for evaluating an entity assert on an entity linked to the current entity via a foreign key or one to one property
        Parameters:
        propertyInfo - the foreign key or one to one property, must not be null
        assertClass - the subclass of EntityAssertBase used for the linked entity
        assertEvaluator - the callback (usually a block, if called from Gosu) used to evaluate the entity assertion created for the linked entity
        Returns:
        this

      • withArrayOfEntity

        protected <B extends Bean,BA extends EntityListAssertBase<B,BA>> A withArrayOfEntity(IEntityPropertyInfo propertyInfo,
                                                                                     java.lang.Class<BA> assertClass,
                                                                                     AssertEvaluator<java.util.List<B>,BA> assertEvaluator)
        Utility for evaluating an entity list assert on an entity linked to the current entity via an array property
        Parameters:
        propertyInfo - the array property, must not be null
        assertClass - the subclass of EntityAssertBase used for the entity
        assertEvaluator - the callback (usually a block, if called from Gosu) used to evaluate the entity assertion created for the linked entity
        Returns:
        this

      • narrowToSubtype

        protected <B,BA extends com.guidewire.testharness.assertion.BaseAssert<B,BA>> BA narrowToSubtype(java.lang.Class<B> subtype,
                                                                                                 java.lang.Class<BA> subtypeAssert)
        Utility that verifies the current entity is of a particular subtype and then returns another custom assertion which is subtype specific. Intended as a subclasser utility, not for general use. Subclassers should wrap this in subtype specific, no argument, methods e.g. narrowToMySubtype()
        Parameters:
        subtype - the entity subtype; if the current entity is not of this type the narrow will fail
        subtypeAssert - the custom assert for the given subtype
        Returns:
        a new assert of the given class
